STUDY POPULATION : The Very Large Database Lipids ( VLDL ) include adults child clinically refer Vertical Auto Profile ( VAP ) . LIPID MEASUREMENTS : The VAP test ( Atherotech , Birmingham , Alabama , USA ) directly measure cholesterol concentration low density lipoprotein , low density lipoprotein , intermediate density lipoprotein , high density lipoprotein , subfractions , lipoprotein ( ) . Triglycerides database directly measure use Abbott ARCHITECT C‚Äê8000 system ( Abbott Park , Illinois , USA ) . Lipid distribution database closely match population-representative National Health Nutrition Examination Survey ( NHANES ) 2007-2008 . STUDY PROCEDURES : This database investigator-initiated . Only de-identified data reach investigational site . The first data harvest 2011 , encompass 1,350,908 sample . The second harvest underway ; thus far , updated database suit assess seasonal variation establish 2,859,333 sample . The master database house The Johns Hopkins Hospital Baltimore , Maryland , maintain Drs . Jones Martin . Only electronic data , biospecimens , send Hopkins . The academic investigator unrestricted access study data , take responsibility accuracy analysis , authority manuscript preparation submission . VARIABLES : The variable currently VLDL database test date , age , sex , low density lipoprotein , low density lipoprotein , intermediate density lipoprotein , high density lipoprotein , subfractions , lipoprotein ( ) , LDL pattern . From primary variable , many additional variable derive inclusion master database ( e.g. , non-HDL-C , Friedewald LDL-C , TC/HDL-C , etc. ) . Other analytes measure validated assay subset VLDL database include apoB , apoA1 , hsCRP , homocysteine , uric acid , insulin , hemoglobin A1c , 25-hydroxy vitamin D , cystatin C , Lp-PLA2 , TSH , free T3 T4 , pro-BNP , direct bilirubin , CPK , creatinine component comprehensive metabolic panel , magnesium , phosphate . DATABASE ORGANIZATION : In current database , record represent unique patient . The 1st available VAP test patient include . To meet needs variety research question , prospectively plan organize harvest 2 data 3-year interval datasets ( i.e. , VLDL 2006-2008 , 2009-2011 , VLDL 2012-2014 , etc ) , summation dataset ( first VAP test patient ) , serial lab dataset ( patient repeat test ) , ancillary datasets ( subset patient coexist data measure apolipoproteins , vitamin D , hs-CRP , TSH/T4 , etc ) . INDIVIDUAL STUDIES : Individual VLDL study base priori hypothesis aim statistical analysis plan ( SAPs ) peer-reviewed prior execution . In expandable `` Detailed Description '' section , VLDL investigator periodically register individual study update status clinicaltrials.gov .
